acquire-ticket.title: Acquire ticket for a place
acquire-ticket.description: Here you can acquire a ticket for a location at TU Graz.
acquire-ticket.additional-information: This is needed to be allowed to enter a location at TU Graz. If you have activated a 3-G-evidence, you can use it to log in directly at a location at TU Graz for a certain period of time. If you have not activated a 3-G-evidence yet, please use the menu item
acquire-ticket.additional-information-2: to activate a evidence. Alternatively, you can manually confirm that you are carrying 3-G-evidence and be able to prove it in case of a manual control.
acquire-ticket.no-proof-found-message: No valid 3-G-evidence was found. Please activate a valid 3-G detection under the menu item
acquire-ticket.valid-proof-found-message: A valid 3-G-evidence was found. Please select a location to create a ticket.
acquire-ticket.manual-proof-text: I certify that I am vaccinated, tested, or recovered and carry valid evidence of such for the duration of my stay in this place and can present such evidence in the event of a manual inspection.
acquire-ticket.create-ticket-success-body: The acquired ticket for {{place}} was successfully created.
acquire-ticket.check-in-link-description: Do you want to support contact tracing at TU Graz?
acquire-ticket.manage-tickets-text: You can manage your active tickets at:

acquire-3g-ticket.additional-information: You can scan a QR code or upload an existing PDF or image to use it to log in directly at a location for a certain period of time. This is needed to be allowed to enter a location. Alternatively, you can manually confirm that you are carrying 3-G-evidence and be able to prove it in case of a manual control.
acquire-3g-ticket.manual-proof-text: I certify that I am vaccinated, tested, or recovered and carry valid evidence of such for the duration of my stay in this place and can present such evidence in the event of a manual inspection.
acquire-3g-ticket.create-ticket-success-body: The acquired ticket for {{place}} was successfully created.
acquire-3g-ticket.manage-tickets-text: Active tickets could be found. You can manage your active tickets at:
acquire-3g-ticket.confirm-checkbox-valid-cert-text: I confirm the accuracy of my evidence and understand that any misuse of the greenlight app or the provision of incorrect data can lead to legal consequences.
acquire-3g-ticket.confirm-checkbox-no-cert-text: I confirm the accuracy of my evidence and understand that any misuse of the greenlight app or the provision of incorrect data can lead to legal consequences.
acquire-3g-ticket.found-valid-selftest-preCheck: A locally saved self-test was found.
acquire-3g-ticket.no-qr-code-body: No QR code was found in the uploaded document.
acquire-3g-ticket.invalid-body: Please try again with another document.
acquire-3g-ticket.invalid-qr-body: The QR code does not contain a valid 3-G-evidence.
acquire-3g-ticket.not-same-person: The person in the uploaded evidence does not match the person logged in.
acquire-3g-ticket.self-test-information: Please check whether the evidence is still valid.
acquire-3g-ticket.trust-and-save-2: Import my 3-G-evidence and save it to this device.
acquire-3g-ticket.confirm-not-checked-body: Please confirm that the information you have provided is correct and that you are aware that misuse of the greenlight app may lead to legal consequences

show-active-tickets.title: Show all active tickets
show-active-tickets.description: Here you can see the list of all valid tickets. You have to show them in case of a manual control.
show-active-tickets.no-tickets-message: You do not have any valid tickets!
show-active-tickets.refresh-ticket-success-body: The ticket for {{place}} was successfully refreshed.
show-active-tickets.delete-ticket-success-body: The ticket for {{place}} was successfully deleted.
show-active-tickets.self-test-information: Please check whether the evidence is still valid.
show-active-tickets.no-evidence: No valid stored 3-G-evidence was found. Show your evidence manually or upload new evidence by creating a new ticket.
show-active-tickets.invalid-evidence: If the 3-G-evidence is no longer valid, you can create a new ticket and upload a new evidence.
show-active-tickets.delete-ticket-notfound-body: No active ticket: {{place}} was found. The ticket has probably already expired or deleted.

error-login-message: You need to be logged in to use this function!
